A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
No. I didn't wait two years for 18 hours to pass in the Star Wars Universe. This movie is full of cliche nonsense and introduces a bunch of crap that is clearly meant to be good toy material to market to children. Rey is still a mary sue\, probably worse so now. Basically every possibly interesting character is defeated with no fight at all. 

It took them two years to make BB-8 worse than Jar Jar.

I'm done with Star Wars after this.
